text: N tan nan i benba sugandi Isirayila bɔnsɔɛ birin tagi, a xa findi sɛrɛxɛdubɛ ra n ma hɔrɔmɔlingira kui, a xa te n ma sɛrɛxɛ gande, a xa surayi gan sɛrɛxɛ ra, a nun a xa sɛrɛxɛdubɛ donma kuye ragoro a ma n ya i. Isirayila e xa sɛrɛxɛ ganxi naxan birin fima n ma, n a birin fi i benba bɔnsɔɛ nan ma.»
